main.name: Morgan Radic
main.description: I love creating Scalable Backend Systems and working with AWS.
main.bio: I am a developer and architect with 2+ years of experience implementing backend systems within AWS.  Through my work I have helped multiple organizations create scalable APIs, mainly focusing on Serverless or Microservices architecture.  Outside of my work you can find me either cooking, backpacking, hiking, golfing, or playing volleyball.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
